string.text: Assassinate target
Find and eliminate the target, then return to Sultan for payment.

There are many people in the Zone who like rubbing me the wrong way or showing me disrespect. Some of these pricks either owe me money or fucked up some deal. They're nothing but rats that need stomping out. If you're up for the task, I'll give you their information so that you can track them through GPS.
Great work. Here's a little something for your trouble.
Lead the way and we'll follow. You'll get your cut when we're done. Just make sure we're the ones doing the looting, and watch our backs.
We should get moving... My trigger finger is getting itchy. Just remember: we get the loot!
You did your job well. Here's your cut.
Okay.
Clear area of mutants
Mutants have been spotted near a specific location, making the area dangerous. You have been tasked to eliminate the threat within the area. Report back to Olivius after the job is done.

We've been looking for someone with enough balls to clear out mutants in a few places. Stalkers aren't coming around here because they're too chicken. If we don't do something about it, we won't have anyone left to 'borrow' any goods from, and we'll have to move out of this territory.
Fantastic! Here is your payment. I'll make sure to put a good word in for you with the boss.
Eliminate enemy threat
You have been tasked to eliminate a territorial threat. Report back to Olivius after the job is done.
Bitches are moving into our territory. The boss gave me orders to recruit a low-life with enough balls to reclaim some of these camps. What do you say? Got enough hair on your chest?
Fantastic! Here is your payment. I'll make sure to put a good word in for you with the boss.
Chiki-briki i v damki
Get the upper hand on local stalkers by relieving them of their valuables long enough until your band of merry men are satisfied.
There are a few guys who are looking for another to join up with them for a while. They need a scout to take them out looking for prime targets and will pay you once your job is done.
Nice take, eh? Here is your cut.
Hitman
Olivius has contracted you to run a hit. Find and eliminate the target then return to him for payment.
I have a list of people who've rubbed me the wrong way. I want you to rub them out. What do you say?
Good, you got rid of that asshole! Here is what I promised.
Find %s
%s are required by Limpid to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I'm in desperate need of new tools, man. I can't do anything with the rusty shit I have, and I'm running out of gun oil. If you're 'interested in helping me out, I'll tell you what I need.
I need a set of basic tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Perfect! This is just what I need, man. I can properly upgrade gear now!
Find %s
%s are required by Limpid to install advanced equipment upgrades. You should bring them back to him if you find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of those, but if you can find one, I need it.
You followed through again! Good deal, man. Here's some dosh.
